eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkCancelled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkFulfilled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkRequested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an update to `requestTokensRemoved` is made. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

functionDecorators.name: fulfill
functionDecorators.description: Receive the response in the form of uint256.

functionDecorators.name: requestAnimeData
functionDecorators.description: Create a Chainlink request to retrieve API response, find the target data, then multiply by 1000000000000000000 (to remove decimal places from data).

functionDecorators.name: withdrawLink
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw LINK from this contract * NOTE: DO NOT USE THIS IN PRODUCTION AS IT CAN BE CALLED BY ANY ADDRESS. THIS IS PURELY FOR EXAMPLE PURPOSES ONLY.
